description.value:
You understand how to defend yourself and others against your prey. When you grant bonuses from @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Monster Hunter]{Monster Hunter}, you and your allies also each gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feat-effects.Effect: Monster Warden]{Effect: Monster Warden}
